description: The AirPods 4 offer an immersive sound experience with enhanced noise cancellation and a longer battery life, designed for seamless integration with Apple devices.
Specification: Spatial audio with dynamic head tracking
Up to 30 hours total battery life with charging case

description: Galaxy Buds 3 Pro are premium earbuds from Samsung with excellent sound quality, adaptive ANC, and a comfortable fit.
Specification: Hi-Fi sound quality with 24-bit audio support
Up to 29 hours total battery life with charging case
